div.div:
Cabrillo Pride Cabrillo Unified School District schools create a space where your students learn, find their passions and achieve their dreams. School should be a place where students discover dreams and believe their dreams can come true.
A Place for Students to Dream and Achieve
Helping students find their passions and prepare academically for each stage of their educational journey is the most important work we do in the Cabrillo Unified School District (CUSD), from instilling a love of learning in our youngest students to offering the classes and experiences our middle and high school students need to achieve their goals. (More about us)
498 Kelly Avenue, Half Moon Bay, CA 94019 | Phone 650 712-7100 | Fax 650 726-0279

li.li: The Cabrillo Unified School District (CUSD) prohibits discrimination, harassment, intimidation, and bullying based on actual or perceived ancestry, age, color, disability, gender, gender identity, gender expression, nationality, race or ethnicity, religion, sex (sexual harassment), sexual orientation, marital, family, parental status, or association with a person or a group with one or more of these actual or perceived characteristics.

link.div: Education is a partnership between student, family, school and community.
